author: Associated Press
title: Mexican missing persons search effort finds 873 burial pits
description: Officials say that Mexico's effort to find tens of thousands of missing people has uncovered 1,124 corpses in 873 clandestine burial pits
content:
While Mexico faces a backlog of about 40,000 missing-persons cases dating to the countrys 2006-2012 drug war, it also faces a crisis of unclaimed or unidentified bodies.
